mapper.sql: create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, version, deleted, id, org_id, simple_name, attache, secretary, contact_name, phone, setup_time, flow, sup_org, full_name, org_category,sup_org_name,change_term_count,telephone
mapper.select: SELECT tp.`id`,tp.`org_id`,tp.`sup_org`,tp.`full_name`,tp.`simple_name`,tp.`attache`,tp.`secretary`,tp.`org_category`, tp.`contact_name`,tp.`phone`,tp.`setup_time`,tp.`flow`,tp.`create_time`,tp.`code`,tp.`change_time`,tp.`guide_org`,tp.`sup_org_name`,tp.`change_term_count`,tp.`telephone` FROM dj_party_org tp LEFT JOIN dj_sys_org tg ON tp.`org_id` = tg.`id` WHERE tp.`deleted` = 0 AND tg.`deleted` = 0 AND tp.`org_id` = #{orgId} order by tp.`update_time` ASC

select from dj_party_org where deleted = 0 and org_id = #{partyOrg.orgId}
and full_name like CONCAT('%',#{partyOrg.fullName},'%')

SELECT tp.`id`,tp.`org_id`,tp.`sup_org`,tp.`full_name`,tp.`simple_name`,tp.`attache`,tp.`secretary`,tp.`org_category`, tp.`contact_name`,tp.`phone`,tp.`setup_time`,tp.`flow`,tp.`create_time`,tp.`telephone`, tg1.name as supName, tp.`code`,tp.`change_time`,tp.`guide_org`,tp.`sup_org_name`,tp.`change_term_count` FROM dj_party_org tp LEFT JOIN dj_sys_org tg ON tp.`org_id` = tg.`id` left join dj_sys_org tg1 on tg1.id = tp.sup_org WHERE tp.`deleted` = 0 AND tg.`deleted` = 0 AND tp.`org_id` = #{orgId}

SELECT tp.`id`,tp.`org_id`,tp.`sup_org`,tp.`full_name`,tp.`simple_name`,tp.`attache`,tp.`secretary`,tp.`org_category`, tp.`contact_name`,tp.`phone`,tp.`setup_time`,tp.`flow`,tp.`create_time`,tp.`telephone`,sc.address,sc.contacts,tg1.name as supName, sc.name as companyName,sc.phone as companyPhone,tp.`code`,tp.`change_time`,tp.`guide_org`,tp.`sup_org_name`,tp.`change_term_count` FROM dj_party_org tp LEFT JOIN dj_sys_org tg ON tp.`org_id` = tg.`id` left join dj_sys_org tg1 on tg1.id = tp.sup_org left join t_sys_company sc on sc.id = tg.company_id WHERE tp.`deleted` = 0 AND tg.`deleted` = 0 AND tp.`org_id` in
#{orgId}
